decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PL/PP/2585-01, dated 13.11.2015; Ventilation & Extraction Statement, dated 10th July 2013; Travel Plan, dated November 2015; 11a, dated February 2014; 31452/1A, dated 05/12/13; 13, February 2014; 12a, dated February 2014; Design and Access Statement, dated 12 February 2014; - received 04/12/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The A5 use hereby permitted shall not be open to customers outside the following times [08.00-22.00 hours].
Condition : 5 - No machinery shall be operated, no process shall be carried out and no deliveries taken at or despatched from the site outside the following times [07.00-22.00 hours].

Condition : 6 - The development hereby approved shall not be occupied until the secure storage area to house refuse as shown on the approved drawings has been made permanently available and no waste shall be stored outside the site or other than in the designated area.

Condition : 7 - The A5 use hereby permitted shall be retained to the front of the building at ground floor level for the lifetime of the development and shall be open to customers not less than 5 days of the week and for not less than 4 hours on each of those days.
description: Change of use from takeaway (Use Class A5) to commercial kitchen with ancillary takeaway (Use Class B2/A5) and erection of a single storey rear extension to unit and a part first floor rear extension and rear roof extension with two rooflights to front elevation of existing flat above
